Package dev.gamekit.core

Class Renderer

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.core.Renderer
public final class Renderer extends Object
Static class which provides draw methods to draw on the window scene.

  • Method Summary

      font - Font The font to use for the next draw call

    • beginGroup

      public static void beginGroup()
      Configures the renderer to not reset options after next draw call.

      Useful for multiple draw calls which share similar options

    • endGroup

      public static void endGroup()
      Ends a previously called beginGroup()

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clears the Window scene target with current state background color

      Draws a line from P1:(x1, y1) to P2:(x2, y2)
      Parameters:
      x1 - The x-coordinate of P1
      y1 - The y-coordinate of P1
      x2 - The x-coordinate of P2
      y2 - The y-coordinate of P2

      Draws a vertical line from P1:(x, y1) to P2:(x, y2)
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the line
      y1 - The y-coordinate of start point
      y2 - The y-coordinate of the end point

      Parameters:

      x2 - The x-coordinate of the end point

      y - The y-coordinate of the rect center
      width - The width of the rect
      height - The height of the rect

      arcHeight - The height of the corner arc

    • drawImage

      public static void drawImage(BufferedImage img, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Draws a center-origin BufferedImage at (x, y). The image is scaled down to fit within the bounds of the origin and dimensions
      Parameters:
      img - The image to draw
      x - The x-coordinate of the circle
      y - The y-coordinate of the circle
      width - The screen width of the image
      height - The screen height of the image

      Parameters:

      Returns:
